dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S361 IS: Supporting Victims of Human Trafficking Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Ossoff (for himself and Mrs. Blackburn) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To strengthen trafficking victim assistance grant funding.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Supporting Victims of Human Trafficking Act.

section.header: Grants to assist victims of trafficking
section.text: Section 107(b)(2) of the Trafficking Victims Protection Act of 2000 (22 U.S.C. 7105(b)(2)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking shall and insert may;
in clause (i), by striking three percent and inserting up to 7 percent;

clause.text: by striking 5 percent and inserting up to 10 percent; and
by inserting and strengthening program administration and budgeting after activities; and

subparagraph.text: in clause (iii), by striking one percent and inserting up to 1 percent; and

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), strike 75 percent and insert 95 percent.
